plot: Short about actor and singer Rudy Wissler, who provided his voice for the actor of the young Al Jolson in The Jolson Story, produced by Columbia Pictures in 1946. Back then, Rudy Wissler did not appear in the credits.
title: A Tribute to Rudy Wissler
plot_es: Short about actor and singer Rudy Wissler, who provided his voice for the actor of the young Al Jolson in The Jolson Story, produced by Columbia Pictures in 1946. Back then, Rudy Wissler did not appear in the credits.
plot_en: Short about actor and singer Rudy Wissler, who provided his voice for the actor of the young Al Jolson in The Jolson Story, produced by Columbia Pictures in 1946. Back then, Rudy Wissler did not appear in the credits.
